meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Daniel Cohen Stephanie Munroe Tim Kresowik Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6127.

td.p: Daniel Cohen, an interactive developer originally from Liverpool, New York
Stephanie Munroe, a movie editor from Brookline, Massachusetts
Tim Kresowik, a urology resident from Iowa City, Iowa (whose 1-day cash winnings total $19,201)

tr.td: THE SISTINE CHAPEL
1990s TV
A CAPITAL IDEA?
THE AUTOBAHN SOCIETY
WHO'D YOU KILL TO GET THAT JOB?
"H_BO"
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with the letter "H" and somewhere further along, there will be a "B" and an "O".)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The Sistine Chapel is best known for its ceiling painted by this man')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The Sistine Chapel is best known for its ceiling painted by this man

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'Will Smith rapped, "Looked at my kingdom, I was finally there, to sit on my throne as the prince of" this')

tr.td: Will Smith rapped, "Looked at my kingdom, I was finally there, to sit on my throne as the prince of" this

toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', '(Tim: [Shakes head])

Timon of Athens

Tim
Triple Stumper
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_2', 'clue_J_1_2_stuck', '(Stephanie: [Beaten to the buzzer by Tim] Who was Pope Julius--oop.)
(Tim: Who was Pope... Julian--uh, [*]. Pope [*].)
(Alex: Right. You were almost thrown off because Stephanie would have given an incorrect response.)
(Stephanie: I would have.)

Sixtus

Tim
')

tr.td: Tim
Stephanie

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Poor Washington. The Senators keep leaving them. They became the Twins, and then they became the Rangers.)
...
(Stephanie: [Apologetically, after her wager is revealed] I know nothing about sports. This must be the only thing I know.)
(Alex: But what about the president? You know something about presidents.)
DanielWho is T ?
$1,142
StephanieWho was Nixon
$100
TimWho is Richard Nixon
$3,000
Richard Nixon')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'As both vice president & president, he threw out a season\'s 1st pitch, each time for a different Senators franchise')

tr.td: BASEBALL & THE PRESIDENCY
As both vice president & president, he threw out a season's 1st pitch, each time for a different Senators franchise
Tim
Stephanie
Daniel
2-day champion: $42,201
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Tim
Stephanie
Daniel

22 R
(including 2 DDs),
5 W

14 R,
3 W
(including 1 DD)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
